data.title: Entrepreneur Whom We Admire Most 1.0 Enzo Ferrari's Background
data.meta_description: Enzo Ferrari - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Enzo Ferrari was an Italian race car driver and entrepreneur who founded Ferrari, one of the world's most prestigious high-performance sports car manufacturers. He was born in Italy in 1898 and had a passion for racing from a young age. Throughout his career, he raced for Alfa Romeo and founded Scuderia Ferrari as Alfa Romeo's racing team. In 1939, he founded Auto Avio Costruzioni, which would later become Ferrari. Under his leadership, Ferrari achieved over 5,000 racing victories and numerous championships. Enzo Ferrari played a pivotal role in establishing Ferrari as a legendary brand known for its racing heritage, technological innovation, and
